description: Trout works wonderfully with toasty hazelnuts in this fishcakes recipe.
keywords: Fish cake,Fish,Low saturated fat,High protein,Low sugar,Potato
name: Trout & Hazelnut Fishcakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g potatoes, peeled and chopped into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pot of water, bring to the boil and cook for 10-12 minutes. Drain well. Tip into a bowl and mash with the milk.
Flake the smoked trout into the bowl with the potatoes and add parsley, lemon zest and garlic. Mix well to combine.
Spread the finely chopped hazelnuts on a plate. Shape the potato mix into patties with your hands and coat each side with hazelnuts.
Heat the oil in a non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the fishcakes for 3-4 minutes on each side until toasted and golden. Serve with extra lemon wedges and salad, if desired.
